elements.name: question1
elements.title: Is it enough if you only state the detailed price when selling yogurts?
elements.correctAnswer: No. For measurable goods, you must also specify the base price.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Are you allowed to price an item of clothing at CHF 100 and then charge VAT on top when you collect it?
elements.correctAnswer: No. All goods and services offered on the sales floor must be marked with the final price, i.e. including VAT.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Is it permissible to display the price of a bar of chocolate only on the shelf?
elements.correctAnswer: Yes, detailed prices must be written on the goods themselves or immediately next to them (e.g. on the shelf).
